insert into contacters values(#cid#,#owner#,#username#,#aliasname#,#sendcount#, #receivetime#,#vipscore#)
select c.cid,c.owner,c.username,c.aliasname,IFNULL(da2.Send,0) sendco1.Send,0) sendcount, IFNULL(da2vetime,c.vipscore from mail.contacters c left join ( SELECT owner,username,count(mailid) as 'Receive' FROM Sendntacters co inner join mails ma1 on ma1.sender = co.owner and ma1.sendTo like concat('%',co.username,'%') and ma1.date >= #filter# group by owner,username ) da1 on c.owner = da1.owner and c.username = da1.username left join( SELECT owner,username,count(mailid) as 'Send' FROM mail.contactemail.contacters co inner join mails ma1 on ma1.sender = co.owner
and ma1.sender = co.username and ma1.date >= #filter# group by owner,username ) da2 on c.owner = da2.owner and c.username = da2.username where c.owner = #owner#

update contacters set receivetime = receivetime+1 where cid = #cid#
